item.description: # The purpose of this blog I’m seeking to grow in faith, fervor, and understanding. I will mostly (but not exclusively) write about Catholic themes, such as what I’ve learned from Bible readings or my experiences trying to live a Christian life. I also want to practice writing in Japanese about my thoughts and interests in a way that is genuine, even if what I write is technically poor. Where I write in both English and Japanese, the intention is not necessarily to have equivalent translations side-by-side, but rather direct production in the working language.
